Summary:
If we log in with an unregistered mobile number, it does not show 
any message to register first and send an OTP to the number. After
 we enter a valid OTP, it logs in the user.
Steps to Reproduce:
open apk > login with unregistered 
number
Expected Result:
"A message should appear stating 
either 'Please register first' or 'User
 not registered'."

Summary: The scroll length for the form is too long.
Expected Result: The  scroll length should be fixed

Summary:
After logging out and removing the app from recent apps, when
 reopened, the user is automatically logged in.
Steps to Reproduce:
open apk > login > remove > remove from
recents > reopen
Expected Result: User should be properly logged out

Summary: Resend otp is not working
Expected Result: Resend otp should work

Summary:
Profile information does not update as expected based on the information
 provided during signup.
Expected Result:
Profile information must be updated as 
information given at the time of signup

Summary: Full screen mode is not supported
Expected Result: Full screen mode should be supported

Summary:
After logging in when we press back button then we are redirecting to login 
page and eventually we are logout
Expected Result:
After signing in, we can't go directly to the 
signup page; we must log out first.

Summary: In prayers timing section on behalf of icons it is better to write Prayer name
Expected Result: Icons should be replaced by prayer names

Summary: The spelling of Dhikr is wrong
Expected Result: Spelling must be correct

Summary: Multiple languages are not completely supported
Expected Result: Multiple language should completely supported

Summary:
The heding stating "Enter 6 digit verifiaction code sent to your phone number" is 
not in center
Steps to Reproduce: open apk > go to login > otp page
Expected Result: The heading must be in center

Summary: No space between otp and phone text
Steps to Reproduce: open apk > go to login > otp page
Expected Result: There should be space between two fields

Summary: When we update the profile picture, it does not get updated.
Steps to Reproduce: open apk > login > Profile > update picture
Expected Result: The profile picture should be updated whenever the user changes it.

Summary: Nearby Mosques are not coming
Expected Result: Nearby Mosque should come on the basis of location

 both.
